text.name: Christmas Nightmare
text.desc: [EndSkill] At max HP, heal 10 SP at Turn End and gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [[Sinking]]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 1 [Reduction] next turn

text.name: Christmas Nightmare
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If target has less than 0 SP, deal +1% damage for every SP value below 0 (max 45%)
[EndSkill] At max HP, heal 10 SP at Turn End and gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal (2 + highest Reson.)% of the missing HP on self (max 30% per Skill)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [[Sinking]]<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 1 [Reduction] next turn<style="highlight">

text.name: Christmas Nightmare
text.desc:
If target has less than 0 SP, deal +1% damage for every SP value below 0 (max 45%)
[EndSkill] At max HP, heal <style="highlight">15 SP at Turn End and gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn<style="highlight">
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal (<style="highlight">3 + highest Reson.)% of the missing HP on self (max 30% per Skill)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [[Sinking]]<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 1 [Reduction] <style="highlight">and Fragility[TabExplain] against the Affinity of the highest Reson. next turn

passiveList.name: Insomniac Night
passiveList.desc:
Combat Start: against all enemies, inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] to all enemies (# of enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states) times. (2 times per turn)
- Effect does not stack with E.G.O Gifts with the same effect.
